file.name: nfusionsolutions.biz-1-swagger.yaml
file.content: openapi: 3.0.0 info: contact: email: support@nfusionsolutions.com name: nFusion Solutions url: https://nfusionsolutions.com/contact-us x-twitter: nfusionsolution description: "[nFusion Solutions](https://nfusionsolutions.com) provides [REST and streaming APIs](https://nfusionsolutions.com/data-feeds/) that deliver enterprise-grade financial data. Data sets include real-time and historical pricing for Spot prices of precious metals such as Gold, Silver, Platinum, and Palladium, exchange rates for major currency pairs, exchange rates for Crypto Currencies such as BTC, ETH, and LTC. All API access requires authentication. In order to be issued access credentials you must first enter into a service agreement with nFusion Solutions and acquire a commercial license. For information on how to obtain a licence [take a tour of our products](https://nfusionsolutions.com/nfusion-solutions-metals-gold-price-\ feed-tour/) or email sales@nfusionsolutions.com." license: name: Commercial License url: https://nfusionsolutions.com/nfusion-solutions-metals-gold-price-feed-quote/ title: nFusion Solutions Market Data API v1 version: "1" x-apisguru-categories: - financial x-logo: url: https://twitter.com/nfusionsolution/profile_image?size=original x-origin: - format: swagger url: https://api.nfusionsolutions.biz/swagger/1/swagger.json version: "2.0" x-providerName: nfusionsolutions.biz paths: "/api/v{version}/Currencies/history": get: description: "Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size\r \r The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results\r being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values." operationId: History parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: "comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD" in: query name: pairs required: true schema: type: string - description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd in: query name: start required: true schema: type: string format: date-time - description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date. in: query name: end required: false schema: type: string format: date-time - description: "aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), \r followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:\r y=year,\r m=month,\r w=week,\r d=day,\r h=hour,\r mi=minute\r \r For example, a yearly interval can be specified as \"y\" and 6 month interval as \"6m\". \r \r If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day." in: query name: interval required: false schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_IntervalCollection_" type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_IntervalCollection_" type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get historical prices for requested currency pairs tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/history/supported": get: description: "Only the currency pairs in the direction noted can be used with the history endpoint.\r For example: USD/CAD is not the same as CAD/USD" operationId: SupportedCurrencies_History parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: type: string type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: type: string type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get list of currency pairs supported by the history endpoint tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/rate": get: description: Current Mid Rate operationId: Rate parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: "comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD" in: query name: pairs required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_Rate_" type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_Rate_" type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get latest mid rate for requested currency pairs tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/rate/supported": get: description: "Any of the currencies in this list can be paired with any other currency in this list when supplied to the Rate endpoint.\r For example: USD/CAD,CAD/USD,USD/EUR,EUR/CAD" operationId: SupportedCurrencies_Rate parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: type: string type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: type: string type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get list of currencies supported by the rate endpoint tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/summary": get: description: Current and daily summary information combined into a single quote operationId: Summary parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: "comma separated list of currency pairs. For example: USD/CAD,USD/EUR,USD/AUD" in: query name: pairs required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_Summary_" type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_Summary_" type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get latest Summary for requested currency pairs tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Currencies/summary/supported": get: description: "Only the currency pairs in the direction noted can be used with the Summary endpoint.\r For example: USD/CAD is not the same as CAD/USD" operationId: SupportedCurrencies_Summary parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: type: string type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: type: string type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get list of currency pairs supported by the Summary endpoint tags: - Currencies "/api/v{version}/Metals/benchmark/history": get: description: "Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size\r \r The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results\r being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.\r \r The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame." operationId: BenchmarkHistory parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: comma separated list of metals in: query name: metals required: true schema: type: string - description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd in: query name: start required: true schema: type: string format: date-time - description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date. in: query name: end required: false schema: type: string format: date-time - description: "aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), \r followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:\r y=year,\r m=month,\r w=week,\r d=day,\r h=hour,\r mi=minute\r \r For example, a yearly interval can be specified as \"y\" and 6 month interval as \"6m\". \r \r If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day." in: query name: interval required: false schema: type: string - description: if true use historical currency rates otherwise current currency rates. Defaults to true. in: query name: historicalfx required: false schema: type: boolean - description: comma separated list of conversion currencies, defaults to USD in: query name: currency required: false schema: type: string - description: "unit of meaure, defaults to troy ounces. allowed values are:\r mg=milligram\r g=gram\r kg=kilogram\r gr=grain\r oz=ounce\r toz=troy ounce\r ct=carat\r dwt=pennyweight" in: query name: unitofmeasure required: false schema: type: string enum: - mg - g - kg - gr - oz - toz - ct - dwt - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_IntervalCollection_" type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_IntervalCollection_" type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get historical benchmark prices for requested metals tags: - Metals "/api/v{version}/Metals/benchmark/summary": get: description: Benchmark price information operationId: BenchmarkSummary parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: comma separated list of metals in: query name: metals required: true schema: type: string - description: comma separated list of conversion currencies, defaults to USD in: query name: currency required: false schema: type: string - Metals "/api/v{version}/Metals/spot/history": get: description: "Historical OHLC data for the specified period and interval size\r \r The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results\r being truncated to conform to result size limits. See comments on interval parameter for details on valid interval values.\r \r The historicalfx flag is used to determine whether to apply today's fx rates to a historical period, or to apply the historical rates from that same time frame." operationId: SpotHistory parameters: - description: auth token in: query name: token required: true schema: type: string - description: comma separated list of metals in: query name: metals required: true schema: type: string - description: start date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd in: query name: start required: true schema: type: string format: date-time - description: end date of time period. format is yyyy-mm-dd. Default is current date. in: query name: end required: false schema: type: string format: date-time - description: "aggregation interval. Composed of an optional integer value (which defaults to 1 when not specified), \r followed by a type string which must be one of the following values:\r y=year,\r m=month,\r w=week,\r d=day,\r h=hour,\r mi=minute\r \r For example, a yearly interval can be specified as \"y\" and 6 month interval as \"6m\". \r \r If not specified the interval parameter default is 1 Day." in: query name: interval required: false schema: type: string - description: if true use historical currency rates otherwise current currency rates. Defaults to true. in: query name: historicalfx required: false schema: type: boolean - description: comma separated list of conversion currencies, defaults to USD in: query name: currency required: false schema: type: string - mg - g - kg - gr - oz - toz - ct - dwt - description: to override content negotiation specify a value of json or xml in: query name: format required: false schema: type: string enum: - json - xml - description: Number of years of history to return. Defaults to 10. in: query name: years required: false schema: type: integer format: int32 - description: The requested API version in: path name: version required: true schema: type: string default: "1" responses: "200": description: Success content: application/json: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_Summary_" type: array uniqueItems: false application/xml: schema: items: $ref: "#/components/schemas/Response_Summary_" type: array uniqueItems: false "400": description: Bad Request "401": description: Unauthorized summary: Get Historical Annual Performance for requested metals tags: - Metals "/api/v{version}/Metals/spot/ratio/history": get: description: "Historical data for the specified period and interval size\r \r The combination of the interval parameter and start and end dates can result in results\r being truncated to conform to result size limits.
